doc: Squid Hall build file that executes the 'contentpipeline' and 'contentprepare' sub build files.

config.doc: Like module files, uses world.module.json defaults; however you can override module configurations during the generation step as well.

options.doc: There are no options at this time, the 'options' section may be left out.

doc: There are no package steps for this file, the 'package-steps' section may be left out.
